row.Name: DunningLetterNotification
row.Subject: You ((contact.FullName)) Account is past due
row.column:
Dear ((contact.Attention)).

This is an automatic email to notify you that you have a past due payment due on your account.
You will find a copy of the past due statement attached to this email.
We appreciate your help in getting this paid promptly.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at ((DefaultCompanyContact.EMail)).

Thank you for choosing ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)).

row.Name: QuotationNotification
row.Subject: ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)) Customer Quote #((OrderNbr)) available for viewing
row.column:
Dear ((Billing_Contact.Attention)).

This is an automatic email to notify you that you have a new Sales Quote available on your account.
You will find a copy of Quote #((OrderNbr)) attached to this email.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at ((DefaultCompanyContact.EMail)).

Thank you for choosing ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)).

row.Name: SalesOrderNotification
row.Subject: ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)) Sales Order #((OrderNbr)) available for viewing
row.column:
Dear ((Billing_Contact.Attention)).

This is an automatic email to notify you that you have a new Sales Order available on your account.
You will find a copy of SO #((OrderNbr)) attached to this email.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at ((DefaultCompanyContact.EMail)).

Thank you for choosing ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)).

row.Name: EMailConfirm
row.Body:
Dear, ((FirstName)) ((LastName)).
Please click the link below to activate your subscription to our email update.
<action name="GenerateActivation" holdInMinutes="4320"></action> [http://www.acumatica.com/Confirmation/default.aspx?activationID=((ActivationID))]
If you are unable to click on this link, please copy and paste the entire link into the address bar of your web browser.
((({S:Warn}We sent you this confirmation email in order to protect your privacy. If you do not activate your subscription now, we will be unable to send you the information you have requested. Please click the link above now to activate your subscription.)))
You may unsubscribe from this list at any time. To do so, just follow the directions for unsubscribing in future emails we send you.
Thank you!

row.Name: InvoiceNotification
row.Subject: ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)) Invoice #((RefNbr)) available for viewing
row.column:
Dear ((Billing_Contact.Attention)).

This is an automatic email to notify you that you have a new Invoice available on your account.
You will find a copy of Invoice #((RefNbr)) attached to this email.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at ((DefaultCompanyContact.EMail)).

Thank you for choosing ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)).

row.Name: ShipmentConfirmationNotification
row.Subject: ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)) Shipment #((ShipmentNbr)) has been shipped
row.column:
Dear ((Shipping_Contact.Attention)).

This is an automatic email to notify you that Order #((OrderList.OrderNbr)) has been shipped with Shipment #((ShipmentNbr)).
You can find a copy of the shipment confirmation attached to this email.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at ((DefaultCompanyContact.EMail)).

Thank you for choosing ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)).

row.Name: CCARDEXPIRATION
row.Subject: The Credit Card you have on file with ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)) is about to expire!
row.column:
Dear customer,

According to our records, your credit card ((Descr)) is expiring on ((ExpirationDate)).

On order to avoid an interruption in our service, please provide us a valid credit card for the service fee charging.

Thank you!

row.Body:

Please click the link below to activate your account.

If you are unable to click on this link, please copy and paste the entire link into the address bar of your web browser.

row.Name: StatementNotification

row.column:
Dear ((contact.Attention)).

This is an automatic email to notify you that you have a new Statement available on your account.
You will find a copy of Statement attached to this email.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at ((DefaultCompanyContact.EMail)).

row.Name: EMailSubscrConfirm
row.Subject: Subscription confirmation
row.Body:
Dear, ((FullName)). Please click the link below to activate your subscription to our email update.
link
If you are unable to click on this link, please copy and paste the entire link into the address bar of your web browser. <action name="GenerateActivation" holdInMinutes="60"></action> [http://www.acumatica.com/Confirmation/default.aspx?activationID=((ActivationID))]
You may unsubscribe from this list at any time. To do so, just follow the directions for unsubscribing in future emails we send you.
Thank you!

row.Name: E-Mail Confirm Receipt
row.Subject: Received: ((Subject))
row.Body: <HTML><head></head><body spellcheck="false" contenteditable="true" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; height: 100%; font-family: arial; font-size: small;">Thank you for contacting us. We have received your new email message.</body></HTML>

row.Name: E-Mail Support Common Response
row.Subject: Automated Response to your email to Acumatica Support - Do not reply
row.column:
Thank you for contacting support.
Unfortunately, we are unable to identify any existing support cases related to your email.
If this is a new support issue, please visit the Support Portal and submit your New Support Case online.
Support emails can only be used if the email contains a valid open support case ticket number.
If you already have an open case, please make sure to not alter the subject line when you reply to the support related emails.

row.Name: Login Reminder Template
row.Subject: Username Reminder
row.column:
Username Reminder
Hello ((UserList.FirstName))!
We have received a username reminder request for this email.
If you didn't request such information please ignore this message.

Username: ((UserList.Username))


((UserList.RecoveryLink))
This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Name: Password Reminder Notification
row.Subject: Password Recovery
row.column:
Password Recovery
Hello ((UserList.FirstName))!
We have received a request to reset the password for your account.
If you didn't request password reset please ignore this message. 

Username: ((UserList.Username)) 

Use the link below to reset your password. The link expires after 24 hours.


((UserList.RecoveryLink))
This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Name: User Welcome Notification
row.Subject: Welcome to the ((GeneralInfo.CompanyName)) system
row.column:
Welcome to Acumatica
Hello ((UserList.FirstName))!
Your Acumatica account has been created. Please login using the following credentials:

Username: ((UserList.Username)) 
Password: ((UserList.Password)) 


((UserList.RecoveryLink))
This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Name: Password Change Notification
row.Subject: System Password Changed
row.column:
System Password Changed
Hello ((UserList.FirstName))!
Your password was changed. Please use it to login to the system.

Password: ((UserList.Password)) 


((UserList.RecoveryLink))
This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Name: Expense Claim Pending Approval notification
row.Subject: Expense Claim #((ExpenseClaim.RefNbr)) awaiting your approval
row.column:
Dear ((Approval.OwnerID.FirstName)) ((Approval.OwnerID.LastName)).

Expense Claim #((ExpenseClaim.RefNbr)) is waiting for your approval. 

Claimed By: ((ExpenseClaim.EmployeeID.AcctCD)) - ((ExpenseClaim.EmployeeID.DefContactID.DisplayName)) 
Description: ((ExpenseClaim.DocDesc)) 
Claim Date: ((ExpenseClaim.DocDate)) 
Claim Total: ((ExpenseClaim.CuryDocBal)) ((ExpenseClaim.CuryID)) 

Claim link: http://erp.url.con/?ScreenId=EP301000&RefNbr=((ExpenseClaim.RefNbr))

row.Name: New Case Comment from Portal
row.Subject: New comment on Case #((Case.CaseCD))
row.column:
There is new comment on your case:

((ActivitiesSelect.Subject))

((ActivitiesSelect.Body))  


Case link: http://erp.url.con/?ScreenId=CR306000&CaseCD=((Case.CaseCD))

This is automatically generated message. Please do not reply on it.

row.Name: Expense Receipt Pending Approval Notification
row.Subject: Expense Receipt #((ClaimDetails.ClaimDetailCD)) awaiting your approval
row.column:
Dear ((ClaimDetails.OwnerID.FirstName)) ((ClaimDetails.OwnerID.LastName)),

Expense Receipt #((ClaimDetails.ClaimDetailCD)) is waiting for your approval.

Claimed By: ((ClaimDetails.EmployeeID.AcctCD)) - ((ClaimDetails.EmployeeID.DefContactID.DisplayName)) 
Description: ((ClaimDetails.TranDesc))
Receipt Date: ((ClaimDetails.ExpenseDate)) 
Claimed Amount: ((ClaimDetails.CuryTranAmt)) ((ClaimDetails.CuryID))

Expense Receipt: http://erp.url.con/?ScreenId=EP301020&RefNbr=((Approval.RefNoteID))

row.Name: NotifyCustomer
row.Subject: Appointment #((AppointmentRecords.RefNbr)) - ((AppointmentRecords.ScheduledDateBegin))
row.column:
Dear ((ServiceOrder_Contact.Attention)) ((ServiceOrder_Contact.ContactID)) - ((ServiceOrderRelated.CustomerID.AcctName))
An appointment has been scheduled with the following information.
Appointment Nbr. ((AppointmentRecords.RefNbr))
Appointment Address:
    ((ServiceOrder_Address.AddressLine1)) ((ServiceOrder_Address.AddressLine2))
    ((ServiceOrder_Address.City)), ((ServiceOrder_Address.State)), ((ServiceOrder_Address.PostalCode))
    ((ServiceOrder_Address.CountryID.CountryID))
Appointment Details:
    Assigned Employee: ((AppointmentRecords.WildCard_AssignedEmployeesList))
    Employee's Cellphone: ((AppointmentRecords.WildCard_AssignedEmployeesCellPhoneList))
    Appointment Date: ((AppointmentRecords.ScheduledDateBegin))
    Appointment Time: ((AppointmentRecords.Mem_ScheduledTimeBegin))
Additional Comment:
    ((AppointmentRecords.LongDescr))
If you have any questions about the appointment please feel free to contact us by referencing the appointment number.
Thank you for choosing us.

This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Subject: Appointment #((AppointmentRecords.RefNbr)) ((ServiceOrderRelated.CustomerID.AcctName)) - ((AppointmentRecords.ScheduledDateBegin))
row.column:

Appointment Nbr. ((AppointmentRecords.RefNbr))
Appointment Details:

    Appointment Time: ((AppointmentRecords.Mem_ScheduledTimeBegin))
Customer: ((ServiceOrderRelated.CustomerID.AcctName))

    Client Cell: ((ServiceOrder_Contact.Phone1))
Appointment Address:
    ((ServiceOrder_Address.AddressLine1)) ((ServiceOrder_Address.AddressLine2))
    ((ServiceOrder_Address.City)), ((ServiceOrder_Address.State)), ((ServiceOrder_Address.PostalCode))
    ((ServiceOrder_Address.CountryID.CountryID))
Additional Comment:
    ((AppointmentRecords.LongDescr))
If you have any questions please contact us.
Thank you,
This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Name: NotifyServiceAreaStaff

Dear Staff Member,

Appointment Nbr. ((AppointmentRecords.RefNbr))

    Appointment Time: ((AppointmentRecords.Mem_ScheduledTimeBegin))
Customer:  ((ServiceOrderRelated.CustomerID.AcctName))

    ((ServiceOrder_Address.City)), ((ServiceOrder_Address.State)), ((ServiceOrder_Address.PostalCode))
    ((ServiceOrder_Address.CountryID.CountryID))
Please notify if you are available.
Kind regards,

This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

Dear ((Project.Billing_Contact.Attention))

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us.
Thank you for choosing ((DefaultCompanyContact.FullName)).

row.Name: Two-factor New Device Code
row.Subject: Device Code
row.column:
Device Code
Hello ((UserList.FirstName))!
Sign in to Acumatica mobile application using the following access code:

Your Code: ((UserList.TwoFactorCode))


After that, you will be able to verify your identity by approving push requests on this device.
This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Name: Two-factor Sign-in Code
row.Subject: Sign-in Code
row.column:
Sign-in Code
Hello ((UserList.FirstName))!
We have received sign-in request for your account.

Your Code: ((UserList.TwoFactorCode))


If you do not recognize this sign-in request, then someone else is trying to access your account. In this case, your should sign in and reset your password.
This message has been sent automatically, you do not need to reply.

row.Name: CRMQuote Pending Approval Notification
row.Subject: Quote #((Quote.QuoteNbr)) awaiting your approval
row.Body:
Dear ((Approval.OwnerID.FirstName)) ((Approval.OwnerID.LastName)),

Quote #((Quote.QuoteNbr)) is waiting for your approval.

Owner: ((Quote.OwnerID.AcctCD)) - ((Quote.OwnerID.DisplayName))

Description: ((Quote.Subject))

Quote Date: ((Quote.DocumentDate))

Quote Expires On: ((Quote.ExpirationDate))

Quote Total: ((Quote.CuryProductsAmount)) ((Quote.CuryID))

Quote link: ((GeneralInfo.NotificationSiteUrl))/Main?ScreenId=CR304500&OpportunityID=((Quote.OpportunityID))&QuoteNbr=((Quote.QuoteNbr))

row.Name: E-Mail Request For Information (v2)
row.column:
To respond to the RFI, reply to this email without changing the subject.


REQUEST FOR INFORMATION #((RequestForInformation.RequestForInformationCd))







Date: ((RequestForInformation.CreatedDateTime))


To: ((RequestForInformation.BusinessAccountId.AcctName))

      ((RequestForInformation.BusinessAccountId.DefAddressID.AddressLine1))

      ((RequestForInformation.BusinessAccountId.DefAddressID.AddressLine2))

      ((RequestForInformation.BusinessAccountId.DefAddressID.City)), ((RequestForInformation.BusinessAccountId.DefAddressID.State)), ((RequestForInformation.BusinessAccountId.DefAddressID.PostalCode)) 

      ((RequestForInformation.BusinessAccountId.DefContactID.Phone1)) 

Project: ((RequestForInformation.ProjectId))

Primary Contact: ((RequestForInformation.ContactId.FirstName)) ((RequestForInformation.ContactId.LastName))
Requested By: ((RequestForInformation.CreatedById.FirstName)) ((RequestForInformation.CreatedById.LastName))

Phone: ((RequestForInformation.ContactId.Phone1))

Description: ((RequestForInformation.Summary))

Question:

((RequestForInformation.RequestDetails))

Schedule Impact: ((RequestForInformation.IsScheduleImpactFormatted)) ((RequestForInformation.ScheduleImpact))

Cost Impact: ((RequestForInformation.IsCostImpactFormatted)) ((RequestForInformation.CostImpact))

Spec section:((RequestForInformation.SpecSection))

Answer Due Date: ((RequestForInformation.DueResponseDate))

Design Change: ((RequestForInformation.DesignChangeFormatted))
